name: Bombcrypto Coin
description: The Bomb Crypto 2 is a Bomb game experiences to NFT collectibles on the blockchain by Bombcrypto Coin - BOMB. Players can collect, fight monsters and trade them for real money. The Bomb Crypto 2 game is in the Play-To-Earn genre, where players manage a group of bomb heroes of cyborgs programmed to search for BOMB and fight monsters. Each bomber hero has different stats, if you're lucky you can find bomb heroes with good stats to sell or upgrade them to increase performance and combat ability. Each bomber hero is an NFT which increases ownership as well as tradeability.
